item.title: Philip Tetlock is co-founder of The Forecasting Research Institute
item.description:
Philip E. Tetlock on Twitter

‚ÄúThe Forecasting Research Institute now exists (I‚Äôm a co-founder). https://t.co/Ok5M1i7sqm Its mandate is to advance the science of forecasting for the public good--& is now hiring research and data analysts, content editors, and RAs. https://t.co/SqKDSNUrWL Please spread the word‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/PTetlock/status/1602780384290394112?s=20&t=MVXNQLrCGdx-DUhdjbm6XA

item.title: Which nationalities cry most, and least, when they win the Olympics?
item.description:
Ethan Mollick on Twitter

‚ÄúEveryone cries more than Europeans & Africans when they win at the Olympics. This paper examines cross-cultural emotion when athletes win ü•á. No difference between rich & poorer countries but men do cry more in countries with more female labor equality. https://t.co/jUBmICg8Gk‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/emollick/status/1597647656997642240

source: Thursday assorted links

item.title: Was this a good plan for ‚Äúgoing on the lam‚Äù?
item.description:
NM on Twitter

‚ÄúIt is really odd that SBF hasn‚Äôt even tried to flee. I would shave my head and bribe the first boat to get out of there. In fact, let‚Äôs think about it:‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/noblemillions/status/1602804473688211458?s=46&t=1Icb_cAYjD2OZNWAaDqltQ

item.title: 2023 predictions for LLMs
item.description:
Stanislas Polu on Twitter

‚ÄúAGI does not pop up yet (even if one of the big labs have an internal LLM AlphaZero moment in 2023). Investor craziness dies out, short-context LLM assistants (as per above #1 #3) are heavily commoditized. Still 1-2 massive companies start to emerge in the B2B space #product‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/spolu/status/1602283278421082114

item.title: An LLM for your speeding ticket?
item.description:
Joshua Browder on Twitter

‚ÄúAnyone with a speeding ticket hearing coming up, please DM me. We want to build a @donotpay bot that listens to the court hearing via your AirPods and whispers what to say with GPT-3 and LLMs. We just want to experiment and will pay the ticket, even if you lose!‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/jbrowder1/status/1602484316339986432?s=46&t=2FxK66N-chcZY0KoU2kSsg
